alert.note: Alert for Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 11:22PM CDT until July 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN WOODSON COUNTIES... At 1121 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buffalo, or 8 miles southeast of Yates Center, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yates Center, Buffalo and Rose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
